com.rabbitmq.client

Interface RecoverableConnection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, Connection, Recoverable, ShutdownNotifier
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AutorecoveringConnection

    public interface RecoverableConnection
extends Recoverable, Connection
    Convenient interface when working against auto-recovery connections.
    Since:
    4.0.0

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.rabbitmq.client.Recoverable

        addRecoveryListener, removeRecoveryListener
